ygData.subject: Re: RE: That darn goblin alchemist.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve now camped the middle camp for 9 hours, the single hut camp for 5 hours (killed Mooto 9 times, warrior 6 times, shaman once).. and have not seen the
ygData.messageBody:
I've now camped the middle camp for 9 hours, the single hut camp for 5 hours
(killed Mooto 9 times, warrior 6 times, shaman once).. and have not seen the
alchemist. This is getting frustrating, since this is supposed to be the
"short" camp.

Did the alchemist appear at the middle camp or did he walk over?

-- Raean "Really Sleepy" Bloodyhands, 26th circle, Tunare.

> Personally, I camped the single tent camp for 9 hours with no luck. Killed
> Mooto many, many times. Moved to the middle camp and killed the Alchemist
> within 45 minutes. This was Sunday, btw.
>
> Praelor Dileasai
